name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadGenius - Lightweight Immersive Reading Tool With AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadGenius is a lightweight immersive reading tool that uses AI technology to convert any page content into Markdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
===== English =====

ReadGenius - Redefine Your Web Reading Experience!

🚀 Key Features:

• HTML to Markdown: One-click conversion from messy web pages to clear Markdown
• AI Smart Summary: Quickly grasp core content
• Custom Content Selection: Precisely extract needed information
• Multi-language Support: Seamless switch between English and Chinese
• Sidebar Functionality: Conveniently manage saved articles
• Full-screen Reading Mode: Immersive reading experience
• Local Storage: Support offline reading, protect privacy
• Custom Styles: Personalize your reading preferences
• Code Highlighting: A must-have tool for programmers
• Can export and import Markdown

🎯 Who's it for:

Students, researchers, professionals, information workers, tech enthusiasts... Anyone who needs to efficiently acquire and manage online information!

🌟 Why Choose ReadGenius?

• Simplify complex web pages, improve reading efficiency
• AI-assisted, quickly understand article key points
• Personalized settings, create your exclusive reading space
• Local storage, read worry-free anytime, anywhere

📚 Let ReadGenius be your smart reading assistant, and start a new web reading experience!

Install ReadGenius now and enjoy smart, efficient, and pleasant reading time!


===== 中文 =====

ReadGenius - 重新定义您的网页阅读体验！

🚀 主要特性：

• HTML 转 Markdown：一键将杂乱网页转为结构清晰的 Markdown
• AI 智能摘要：快速把握文章核心内容
• 自定义内容选择：精确提取所需信息
• 多语言支持：中英文无缝切换
• 侧边栏功能：便捷管理已保存文章
• 全屏阅读模式：沉浸式阅读体验
• 本地存储：支持离线阅读，保护隐私
• 自定义样式：个性化您的阅读偏好
• 代码高亮：程序员的阅读利器
• 支持导入导出 Markdown 文档

🎯 适用人群：

学生、研究人员、职场人士、信息工作者、技术爱好者...任何需要高效获取和管理网络信息的人！

🌟 为什么选择 ReadGenius？

• 简化复杂网页，提升阅读效率
• AI 辅助，快速理解文章要点
• 个性化设置，打造专属阅读空间
• 本地存储，随时随地阅读无忧

📚 让 ReadGenius 成为您的智能阅读助手，开启全新的网页阅读体验！

立即安装 ReadGenius，享受智能、高效、愉悦的阅读时光！
